data.summary: Ritsu rolled his eyes (albeit fondly. Shou saw the smile he was trying to hide). “Suzuki,” Ritsu breathed out, more in exasperated exhaustion than the previous kindergarten teacher warning tone.“Ritsu,” Shou smiled up at him, picking at the sweatpant thread again.—Ritsu overworks himself, and Shou helps to make sure he doesn’t fall dead on his feet. They balance each other out.

data.title: Warmth Is in the Empty Spaces of the Heart
data.author: calfhooves
data.summary:
Ritsu Kageyama's chest has space for a heart, two lungs, a fair amount of post-overthinking anxiety, one Shou, and, what he hopes is a gentle, forgiveness.
”How.. What’s all of this?”  Ritsu asked, hands hovering over a small dented scar on Shou’s arm, lost among the patch, all in varying sizes, shapes, and depths, scattered all across his sides and back.
“Ah, well, y’know. Scars.”
“I can see that. Don’t get snarky with me.” Shou was smiling now, though something felt crooked about it.

data.summary: Barely a minute passes where Mob lays sideways on his futon and stares into nothing. The door creaks open. “Shige? We heard some noise…”Mob lifts his head and blinks blearily at the concerned form of his brother. “Ritsu… I… I think I have a crush on Hanazawa.”(Where Mob most definitely has a crush on Hanazawa, and is doing a piss-poor job hiding it)

data.summary: “That’s just it, Reigen-san,” Serizawa says. “Over time, I’ve gotten better at seeing even the faintest auras. I can see Teru-kun’s friends. I can see Takenaka-kun’s.” Serizawa hesitates, searching Reigen’s face curiously before finishing, “And I can see yours.”AU where Reigen has powers, but probably not in the way you would expect.

data.title: "But Who Will Scare The Crows Away?"
data.author: Bandtrees
freeforms: Other Additional Tags to Be Added
Generally Not A Fic To Read While Eating
data.summary: ”That’s not your biggest problem.”--Ritsu is all but ready to collapse under his stress. Guilt, fear, inadequacy all grow worse as he and Kamuro begin their plan to clean up the school. He needs a guide— someone, anyone, to help him feel any control at all as a powerless human.Dimple has been avoiding Seasoning City for fear of being exorcised again. In his place, another spirit takes up the mantle of mentoring Ritsu in his time of need, and showing him the power to step forward before he falls.

data.title: Off To The Races
data.author: Green_Kneesocks
warnings: Choose Not To Use Archive Warnings
data.summary: Kageyama Hana and her husband, Ichimaro, loved their daughter, they really did, but they could not take care of her. Not when they had a son to worry about. Giving her up was the best thing for everyone. Suzuki Touichirou especially. Mob raised by Claw AU. Updates once or twice a day because I have a lot of time on my hands these days. Now has a  Tumblr if you want to see some illustrations NEW ARTWORK HAS BEEN POSTED!!!! If anyone is taking art commissions hit me up I'm always looking for more art to add to the tumblr. There is also a TV Tropes page.World domination arc starts at chapter 1000 for those of you that want to skip ahead.

data.title: Hollow: A Demon!Serizawa Story
data.author: Ace_in_the_Hole
data.summary: Serizawa is a incubus who isn't very good at his job. Far too kind, he is sent by hell for one last chance to charm a soul, or face the dire consequences.This begins before Reigen meets Mob. It's an AU that has some of the cannon plot beats in it, but obviously Serizawa is a a freaking demon.Plan on writing this to an ending. WISH ME LUCK.Big thanks to my friends for reading and inspiring me to write a larger project! It's been a blast to write and see the feedback.

data.summary: He was a poet.And she was the goat that fell down the drain.In which you follow the story of YN and Reigen's shenanigans throughout high school and adulthood, trouble ensures whenever these two are within a radius of each other.Chilli flakes can be a short story, any story, and anything you deem it to be but more than anything its an experience everyone can enjoy by the spew of thoughts I vomited.Major updates to chapter 11 to fit more trauma.(Chapter 13 is not the last chapter but it can be seen as one because I'm not going to update for a while due to exam season)

data.title: Sweet Little Lies
data.author: Tatami_Hokes
warnings: Choose Not To Use Archive Warnings
freeforms: Reigen is having a bad time and Serizawa is too good to him
data.summary: It's been three years since Mob destroyed Seasoning City and Serizawa Katsuya has moved on to a new job in the city.Reigen, now alone again, begins to spiral. He soon falls back on bad habits, but after a brutal attack by an evil spirit leaves him torn between a dream world and reality, he realises he needs help. As his dreams bleed into his waking life, he must learn to open up, or risk losing everything, including his mind.Unfortunately, that means letting Serizawa see the side of Reigen he thought he'd done rather well to hide.(Updates weekly)

data.title: Hell & You
data.author: Torchiclove
freeforms: just the worst decisions you've ever seen
data.summary: “Date someone who’s in love with someone else so we can both get over them? That sounds so fucking stupid,” Shou snarks.“At least you wouldn’t hurt their feelings.”Shou narrows his eyes. He gives Teru a long, lingering look, like he’s sort of angry that he’s right. “Okay,” he says, clapping his hands together so loud it makes Teru jump in his seat, “So this is a date!”

hey guys sorry i am a mermaid au
data.summary: The world swirled around him, sound coming in and out, hot sun and cold breeze melding into something recognizably unbearable. Rage. That’s something he felt. He knew that one well. Not the tired kind he was used to now, but real rage, the same kind that drove him to crawl nearly two miles on his hands and knees to the closest convenience store after leaving the ocean for good. Yet he was back again, and not even two hours later, it tried to take something he loved. Fucking typical.

data.summary: ‘Welcome back believers! This time the Ghost Hunting Club looks for proof of ghosts in the Tsukomo residence. This time, they might find something…!’If anyone scrolled down, they would find social links to the channel’s twitter account and the different members, even the editor, Takenaka Momozo and his soundcloud account was linked. But, the very last line said:Cameraman: Mob.No links, no details on who this was, just another grain of sand in a desert of confusion that was this stupid, ghost-hunting youtube video.-----Mob is a complealty average high schooler with completely average ambitions. He wants to spend time with his brother, walk home hand-in-hand with his crush, and be a respectable employee for his teacher-slash-boss.Instead, it seems the universe has decided that his second year of high school was the best time to make his boring life interesting. He’s been growing apart from his brother, his crush has a tag-along that seems to despise him, and something is awakening under the sleepy belly of Seasoning.Oh, and he’s haunted. That one’s actually the least of his worries.

data.summary: “Ritsu-kun?”Still, nothing. He was definitely worried now. As much as Ritsu may dislike him, he was still always polite and wouldn’t just blatantly ignore him like this. Maybe he was sick or something? Arataka craned his neck, scanning him for possible injuries.And that’s when he noticed the blood.“Holy crap! Ritsu, you’re bleeding!” he exclaimed, fumbling out of his seat and running to him. It looked even worse up close. Blood coated both his hands like a second skin, and speaking of skin, his looked pretty torn up.No response.Now that he was closer, Arataka could hear his very quiet, almost sporadic breathing. Shoot. Something was really wrong.[or, ritsu is stressed & can't stop scratching, so he goes to reigen for help]
